title: News24.com | Coronavirus: 49 more prisoners test positive in Eastern Cape as outbreak worsens
description: The number of prisoners that have tested positive for Covid-19 has risen by 49 cases, following an outbreak at the East London Correctional Centre.
content:
The number of prisoners that have tested positive for Covid-19 has risen by 49 cases, following an outbreak at the East London Correctional Centre, the national correctional services department has confirmed.
